channel.title: Da Der Der Proudly Presents: My AutoResponder Function - Almost every skill!
channel.description:
I know this isn't a script but I did not know where to put it.
I am proud to present my AutoResponder Function! If you put this is one of your scripts and run it, when someone in Runescape talks to you, it will talk back to them. This is GREAT for AntiBan.
[size=10pt]FEATURES:[/size] ------------------------------------- • Many different phrases! • Talks about random things! • If someone asks for one of your levels, it tells them it (besides attack, strength, defence, hitpoints, and hunter)! • Responds quickly!
[size=10pt][font=Verdana]PLEASE TELL ME ANY WAY THAT I COULD MAKE THIS BETTER AND ALSO TELL ME IF YOU LIKE IT OR NOT![/font][/size]
Thanks for looking!
- Da Der Der
↓↓↓↓↓↓↓ [size=16pt][/size]DOWNLOAD IT BELOW↓↓↓↓↓↓↓

item.title: Da Der Der Proudly Presents: My AutoResponder Function - Almost every skill!
item.dc:creator: @Da_Der_Der Da Der Der
item.description:
@Da_Der_Der wrote:

That’s why you tell me certain questions that people ask you as you are autoing and I will edit it and make it better.

Read full topic

item.title: Da Der Der Proudly Presents: My AutoResponder Function - Almost every skill!
item.dc:creator: @autoguy autoguy
item.description:
@autoguy wrote:

I like it many replies and stuff but there’s a few things that i dont like, the questions, they arent always so good cuz then the player might start talking to you and you wont be able to reply to everything which will make him think you’re an autoer. But otherwise, very nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Da Der Der Proudly Presents: My AutoResponder Function - Almost every skill!
item.dc:creator: @syberium syberium
item.description:
@syberium wrote:

I get a compilation error =/ error, it sais “Line 15: [Error] (15:1): Unknown identifier ‘OldLine’ in script C:\DOCUME~1\Owner\LOCALS~1\Temp\Ders_Auto_Talker_Function.scar”
Im guessing i have to download the newline,oldline and the line include or something>?

Read full topic

Actually the original owner of NewLine, OldLine and TheLine was WT-Fawaki, as seen in his Potatoe picker. Although I would like to thank you on the time it took to make a working one.

I didn’t exactly base it on anyones, I just saw that Charmz had one and I likes his NewLine, OldLine, and TheLine ideas so I used them. I’ll put his name in it if you’d like =]

I know this isn’t a script but I did not know where to put it.

I am proud to present my AutoResponder Function! If you put this is one of your scripts and run it, when someone in Runescape talks to you, it will talk back to them. This is GREAT for AntiBan.
